Articles.Content: Freezes when the warp speed is changing, generally when rapidly decreasing warp and especially when using warp-to. Doesn't crash, no error log, just totally freezes. I just want to know if it's more likely to be because I'm using 64 bit on windows or a specific bug with alarm clock or better time warp.

Can you elaborate on the freeze? How long does it last? Does your game crash, or it is just like a small pause. What are your system specifications and mod list?

While it is known that KSP physics system may be CPU demanding, your description is too short to be sure that it is that.

Have the same issue - game freezes and system terminates the game because of not app responding. No logs created, using Unity 64bit.

Here are mod list:

Uhhh... Couldn't the very fact your using 64bit be the very source of the problem? You might wanna see if the problem persists on stock and 32bit installs. If it does than its a computer problem (I think)
